casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Hanna KELLY. No. 199P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*891The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of April 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeals":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
